servinfo.title: Back Up Light Switch Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Back Up Light Switch Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

attention1.ptxt: Refrain from work while exhaust No.2 pipe is hot.

attention3.ptxt: When replacing switch, use care not to let dust enter transmission through switch hole.

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle and disconnect connector from back up light switch.
Remove back up light switch (1) from transmission rear case.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Apply oil to new O-ring (1) and then install back up light switch (2) to transmission rear case.
Check back up light for proper function with ignition switch turned ON and reverse position.
